block.comment: DO NOT EDIT THIS SCRIPT. This script runs the game correctly once the five required grey blocks (see below) are filled in properly.

custom-block.s: choose secret word from %l with length %s

custom-block.comment: Fill in this block. INPUTS: a list of words; a number OUTPUT: a word
Fill in this block. INPUTS: a word; a list of letters OUTPUT: a boolean
Fill in this block. INPUT: a number OUTPUT: a boolean
Fill in this block. INPUTS: a word, a letter OUTPUT: a boolean
Fill in this block. INPUTS: a word; a list of letters OUTPUT: a string of letters and underscores separated by spaces (ex: c _ t)

block-definition.comment: This block creates a duplicate list so that you can set a variable without modifying the original list

block.l: Player, how long should the secret word be?

var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), ide = this.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

block-definition.s: choose secret word from %'wordlist' with length %'length'
